WorkItem.Description:
Hi to all,

i installed the Application like the manual. When i try to create an new Update like JAVA i get an Error called
"Access to module dbo.SwitchLocallyPublished is blocked because the signature is not valid."

Someone can help me to resolve this ?

Thanks
Daniel
WorkItem.Summary: Access to module dbo.SwitchLocallyPublished is blocked because the signature is not valid

Comments.Message:
Hi Daniel,

- Do you have set a trigger into the SQL server to make locally published updates visible in the Wsus Console ?
- Do you have activated the option in WPP to make locally published updates visible in hte Wsus Console ?
- Do you have activated the option in WPP to ignore Code Signing Certificate validation errors ?

Hi,

thanks for your Answer. I solved the Issuses. I set the trigger via SQL MMC on the WID and that doesnt work. I delete the trigger and after this i can publish updates.

Thanks a lot
